name: internet_search
description: An Internet search result API using SerpAPI. When you need a short and clear answer to a specific question, you can use it. The input should be a search query. It also navigates to the top search result and extracts relevant information.

summarize.description: Whether to generate a summary of the search results and extracted information.

name: webpage_retriever
description: A module that accepts a URL address and retrieves the text content and optionally a screenshot of the webpage.

url.description: The URL address of the webpage to retrieve.

capture_screenshot.description: Whether to capture a screenshot of the webpage.

name: rss_feed_reader
description: Reads and parses RSS feeds, allowing you to add, remove, and retrieve feed entries.

action.description: The action to perform on the RSS feed.

feed_url.description: The URL of the RSS feed.

category.description: The category of the RSS feed (optional).

enabled.description: The enabled status of the RSS feed (optional).

entry_title.description: The title of the entry to remove (required for 'remove_entry' action).
